overview: Moving from Redding to Los Angeles, Roger and Lee Anne hope to make a better life. When their baby is born with a rare heart defect, they are forced to give up those dreams and make decisions that will give them stability. A landscape out of balance begins to emerge.
tagline: "and the Wizard of Oz laserdisc began skipping right when Dorothy began to click her heels, there's no place, there's no place..."
title: Transposition of the Great Vessels
